St. Martin's Cathedral

Church

Gothic cathedral where Hungarian kings were crowned.

  • Zone: Old Town
  • Recommended time: 45–60 minutes

Curiosities

  • A gilded replica crown sits atop the spire.
  • Coronation ceremonies took place here between 1563 and 1830.
